duties_responsibilities.duty: Work one-on-one with students to improve their reading comprehension and overall love of reading.
Collaborate with the Program Manager to coordinate the implementation of individualized reading programs for students.
Turn in weekly data reports, timesheets, and other records to the Program Manager/Lead Tutor at your site.
Interface with the Program Manager/Lead Tutor to schedule pre-tutoring testing and post-tutoring testing.
Report directly to the Program Manager/Lead Tutor at your assigned location.
Exude positive energy and have an enthusiasm and passion for helping students achieve their reading goals.
Complete a week-long training in the FAST curriculum.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education or related field (Master's preferred)
